availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William J. Ashcroft (Irvine, Estill County, Kentucky, carpenter.)

body.p: Irvine, Estill County, Kentucky, carpenter. Kentucky native. Son of Gideon Ashcroft and Nancy Ashcroft. Married Julia Ann Webb Ashcroft in Estill County, Kentucky on April 15, 1855. Resident in Estill County, Kentucky in 1850. Carpenter in Estill County, Kentucky in 1860. Mentioned on receipt dated July 25, 1864 for services.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, p. 212. KYR-0002-222-0130.
